程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.event

类 ScreenEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent
直接已知子类:
ScreenEvent.BackgroundRendered, ScreenEvent.CharacterTyped, ScreenEvent.Closing, ScreenEvent.Init, ScreenEvent.KeyInput, ScreenEvent.MouseInput, ScreenEvent.Opening, ScreenEvent.Render, ScreenEvent.RenderInventoryMobEffects
public abstract class ScreenEvent extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
Fired on different events/actions when a Screen is active and visible. See the various subclasses for listening to different events.

These events are fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.

另请参阅:
  • ScreenEvent.Init
  • ScreenEvent.Render
  • ScreenEvent.BackgroundRendered
  • ScreenEvent.MouseInput
  • ScreenEvent.KeyInput

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.BackgroundRendered
    Fired directly after the background of the screen is drawn.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.CharacterTyped
    Fired when a keyboard key corresponding to a character is typed.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.Closing
    Fired before a Screen is closed.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.Init
    Fired when a screen is being initialized.
    private static class 
    ScreenEvent.KeyInput
    Fired whenever a keyboard key is pressed or released.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.KeyPressed
    Fired when a keyboard key is pressed.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.KeyReleased
    Fired when a keyboard key is released.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed
    Fired when a mouse button is pressed.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseButtonReleased
    Fired when a mouse button is released.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseDragged
    Fired when the mouse was dragged while a button is being held down.
    private static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseInput
    Fired whenever an action is performed by the mouse.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseScrolled
    Fired when the mouse was dragged while a button is being held down.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.Opening
    Fired before any Screen is opened, to allow changing it or preventing it from being opened.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.Render
    Fired when a screen is being drawn.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.RenderInventoryMobEffects
    Fired ahead of rendering any active mob effects in the
    引用无效 
    inventory screen
    .
